      • defaultName

        public static java.lang.String defaultName
        Stores the default name for armor.

        Set to "armorName".

      • defaultProtectionAmount

        public static double defaultProtectionAmount
        Stores the default protection amount for armor.

        Set to "A special item".

      • defaultDescription

        public static java.lang.String defaultDescription
        Stores the default description for armor.

        Set to "An armor piece".

      • defaultDurability

        public static int defaultDurability
        Stores the default durability for armor.

        Set to 100

      • defaultMaxDurability

        public static int defaultMaxDurability
        Store sthe default maximum durability for armor.

        Set to 100

      • defaultUnbreakable

        public static boolean defaultUnbreakable
        Stores the default unbreakable value.

        Set to false.

      • ITEMTYPE

        private final java.lang.String ITEMTYPE
        Stores the item type for tools. Cannot be changed.

        Set to "armor".

        See Also:

        private boolean unbreakable
        Stores whether or not the armor can break.

        Set to defaultUnbreakable.

      • customVariables

        private java.util.ArrayList<CustomVariable> customVariables
        Stores the custom variables for this armor.

        Set to an empty ArrayList of CustomVariables.

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomVariableFromName

        public java.lang.Object getCustomVariableFromName​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the value of the custom variable in customVariables with the name given.

        If name is null, or no variable with that name is found, return null.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the custom variable.
        Returns:
        The value of the customvariable with the name given. If no name given or one not found, return null.

      • setCustomVariableByName

        public void setCustomVariableByName​(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the value of the variable in customVariables with the name given.

        If no name given, then dont do anything.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the custom variable.
        value - The value that the custom variable will be set to.

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription​(java.lang.String s)
        Sets the value of description.

        If the value is null, then set the description to the defaultDescription.

        Overrides:
        setDescription in class Item
        Parameters:
        s - The new value.

      • setDurability

        public void setDurability​(int a)
        Sets the value of durability.

        If the new value is less than 1, then the weapon breaks.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • increaseDurability

        public void increaseDurability​(int a)
        Increases the value of durability.

        If the weapon is unbreakable then nothing happens. If the new value is less than 1, then it breaks.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • decreaseDurability

        public void decreaseDurability​(int a)
        Decrease the value of durability.

        If the weapon is unbreakable then nothing happens. If the new value is less than 1, then it breaks.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

        public boolean getUnbreakable​()
        Returns unbreakable.
        Returns:
        unbreakable

        public void setProtectionAmount​(double a)
        Sets the value of description.

        value is less than one, then set it to 0.0.

        Parameters:
        a - The new value.

      • getSimpleOutput

        public java.lang.String getSimpleOutput​()

        public java.lang.String getOutput​()
